b.title: CCSS.ELA-Literacy.WHST.6-8.1b
b.details: Write arguments to support claims with clear reasons and relevant evidence
b.info: Support claim(s) with logical reasoning and relevant, accurate data and evidence that demonstrate an understanding of the topic or text, using credible sources.
